name: Auth Email Passwordless
description: Authenticate users with only an email.

sign_in.name: Sign In
sign_in.description: Initiates a verification flow with an intended action attached. Returns a token to reference that verification/action.

verify_code.name: Verify Code
verify_code.description: Verifies ownership of an email and executes the intended action. May error if action is not able to be taken.

email_unregistered.name: Cannot Sign In To Unregistered Email

unknown_err.name: Error of Unknown Type
unknown_err.description: An internal error of an unknown type occurred. No guarantees can be made about the validity of the verification.
